Transcript: This is National Post calling to let you know that your newspaper subscription has expired. Tomorrow, you'll receive your last copy of the newspaper. To renew subscription and ensure uninterrupted home delivery of the National Post, please call 1877503 post. That's 18775037678. Our customer service center is open Monday to Friday 6 a.m. to 8 p.m. and Saturday 6 a.m. to 3 p.m. If you have made a payment for your newspaper in the last day or so, Thank you. Please continue to enjoy home delivery of National Post. Have a nice day.
